CatDescriptText: Mrs. Arnethia Hawthorne, 2845 Webster Avenue, was part of the Pittsburghers Speak Up column published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, October 25, 1958, pg. A1 with question: "Do you think that business and employment are as good as the Eisenhower administration declares that it is?" answer reads: "I can't say because I've never had any trouble getting a job."
TitMainTitle: Portrait of Arnethia Hawthorne wearing dark jacket with light colored collar and rose brooch, holding handbag, standing on sidewalk with pedestrians and buildings with striped awning in background
